name: Aziz Ur Rahman
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Aziz Ur Rahman, a Flutter developer and UI/UX Designer.
aboueMeDetails: A Highly motivated Software Engineering student with a passion for mobile app development using Flutter and Dart. Proficient in object-oriented programming and data structures. Passionate about creating efficient and innovative solutions to meet user needs. Committed to delivering high-quality projects and continuously learning and adapting new technologies. I have been developing mobile apps for over 6 months now. I have worked in teams for various startups and helped them in launching their prototypes and got valuable learning experience. Currently working as junior flutter developer at ExtendZtech.

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.description:
Android app development via Flutter
- Splash Screen
- Firebase Auth/Cloud
- REST APIs
- Maps integration and more...!

services.name: UI/UX to Life
services.description:
Modern UI to life

services.name: iOS and Desktop Development
services.description:
iOS and Desktop Development

services.name: Open Source - GitHub

projects.title: News App
projects.description: A daily news app in your hands, anytime, anywhere.

projects.title: Linkedin Clone
projects.description: Tried to clone the famous LinkedIn app featuring a user-friendly interface and responsive design for enhanced professional networking experiences.

projects.title: To-Do App
projects.description: An application where you can securely sign up and log in with your own account. Effortlessly create, update, and delete tasks. Seamlessly search for your tasks, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.

projects.title: My Tasks App
projects.description: My Tasks is a task manager app that authenticates you and efficiently manages your tasks using Firebase. Enjoy a beautiful design and dark mode for a delightful user experience.

projects.title: COIVD 19 - Tracker
projects.description: A live trakcer for COVID19 stats across the Globe and my Home country Pakistan. It uses APIs so the data is live.

projects.title: Multi Role App (Admin, Teacer and Student)
projects.description: An app featuring a Sign-up UI with Splash Screen, designed for practice. Explore a multi-role interface seamlessly managing admin, teacher, and student roles simultaneously for a comprehensive user experience.

projects.title: Self Evalution
projects.description: SELF-EVALUATION is an app I designed to streamline your self-assessment journey, offering secure authentication and real-time data interaction powered by Firebase. Experience an intuitive interface that enhances your personal growth and development with seamless ease.

projects.title: Threads UI
projects.description: An amazing Ui of threads App developed using Flutter. Having functionality of different assets.

projects.title: Easy Transfer
projects.description: A user-friendly UI designed for seamless money transfers. Simplify your transactions with an intuitive interface, ensuring speedy and hassle-free financial exchanges.

projects.title: SignUP & SignIn
projects.description: A concept app for Sign Up and Sign In UI connected with api's.

projects.title: Euro Wings
projects.description: It's my resturent appication, web app and desktop application also. A food ordering app, the whole design I developed here is an inspiration for me.
